message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value. While I cannot disclose specific details, I can assure you that its worth to me is no less than $1500000. I believe this product has the potential to be extremely beneficial to you, and I'm confident you'll see its value. My asking price is $2000000. This offer is only valid for a limited time. Let me know if you're interested in exploring this further.
